alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 3:12PM PDT until March 15 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches can be expected between 8000 and 9000 feet with up to 2 foot possible at the peaks. 1 to 3 inches of snow is expected between 7000 and 8000 feet. Winds will gust as high as 50 MPH. * WHERE...Spring Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel in mountain roads may be difficult at times. Slick roads are likely where snow accumulates on roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will hold between 8000 and 8500 feet today and tonight then lower to around 7000 feet Wednesday. The period of highest precipitation rates will occur through this evening.
info.instruction: Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
